summary: Trouble ensues when Raja is framed for crimes that actually committed by his evil lookalike Rocky, and the former must prove his innocence and eliminate his nemesis.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Urmila Matondkar|Anupam Kher|Shazia Malik|Farida Jalal|Rajesh Joshi|Sonia Sahni|Tiku Talsania|Harish Patel|Nilofar|Subbiraj|Brahmachari|Puneet|Sharad Sankla|John|Dinesh Anand|Roopesh Mantri|Remo D'Souza|Yogi|Poonam|Gulshan|Puneet Vashisht
title: Aflatoon
